import React from 'react'; import profileAvatar from '../../images/photo-kusto.jpg'; export default Main; function Main() { function handleEditAvatarClick () { const profileAvatar = document.querySelector('.popup_type-edit-avatar'); profileAvatar.classList.add('popup_opened'); } function handleEditProfileClick() { const formEdit = document.querySelector('.popup_type-edit'); formEdit.classList.add('popup_opened'); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { const formAddCardElement = document.querySelector('.popup_type-add-card'); formAddCardElement.classList.add('popup_opened'); } return (
